summary: Replaces the ebony mail with a retxured hq daedric armor.
descriptionHtml:
Ebony Mail Replacer - version 1.0
By Lhamaria
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6060
If you have downloaded this file from another site than www.skyrimnexus.com it has been stolen and does likely contain malware.


•Change log
13/1-2012: Initial release


•Description
This replaces Boethiah\'s artifact, the Ebony Mail, with a retextured daedric armor.


•Permissions/Legal
You are absolutely not allowed to redistribute my (or other\'s included in my work) work or any part of it in any way without my explicit permission.


•Credits:
RedDaimyo for \"Daedric Reborn\" - (Thank you for letting me borrow your texture as base)
You can find the original here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3006
author: Lhamaria
